welcomeText: Welcome to JYY's super mini info extravaganza! Here, you will experience the first day of uni as, well, yourself, a total uni-life-newbie... A typical day consists of many exciting choices and questions alike. Now, let's take them head on!
mapText: You can move to the next event location, marked by a red X, by clicking your character to it through the map of Jyväskylä.
finishedText: Congratulations! You have now completed your first day in the life of a JYU student. Go on now! Great adventures lie ahead...
